Name: Bomb Escape
About the game: Bomb Escape is a game of skill and reflex. The player must be able to dodge bombs, lasers and energy plasmas that try to hit the character. Meanwhile, the player will recharge their energy to activate unique abilities and will be able to collect shields that appear on the map. Avoid touching the spikes and collect coins to unlock new players. Each player has a special skill, find out which one is made for you and the skin that best suits your style! Complete all missions and play with up to 4 local players in the same game. Reach Records and go to different scenarios in the world of Bomb Escape! Prove that you will have the best score of all players in the game! Can you do it?
